article.title: Engineering Services Network Receives Multiple Task Orders
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Engineering Services Network Inc., Arlington, Va., has won $3.5 million in new task orders from the U.S. Navy to conduct combat systems engineering and systems integration. The awards include a follow-on task order by the Naval Surface Warfare Center, Port Hueneme Division of $956,500 for casualty report and Combat System Maintenance Coordinator East Coast services; and $2.6 million delivery order for Combat System In-Service Engineering Agent support.
